body: well that was sad. anyway for the confused commenters basically all those guys who look the same are brothers, karamatsu is the main guy in this one and he meets a man after finding out about how to do sex work from some guys and he thinks the guy loves him so he moves in with him very quickly. basically this relationship is abusive and the man takes advantage of karamatsu, brainwashing him to the point he can't remember himself or his brothers and only wants his "husband". when he is taken back to his house with his family by his brothers he acts different, doesn't understand himself or his surroundings really and still believes his boyfriend is with him. ichimatsu (raggedy hair guy who tried to choke karamatsu) pretends to be his boyfriend to keep karamatsu happy, and osomatsu (guy monologuing at the end) thinks ichimatsu is just selfish. it would probably make more sense if it had more pages with a better resolution because the end is just osomatsu being like "bruh".
I'm guessing that even if I understood the parody visuals, I'd still be confused as fuck
I read this thing front to back and I still have no clue what the fuck its about
a bit to depressing for me
